TextLibrary.Text: You are but a candle in the wind, mortal. You may burn brightly for a short time, but soon you will be snuffed out.
You are but a candle in the wind, mortal. You may burn brightly for a short time, but soon you will be snuffed out.
You are but a candle in the wind, mortal. You may burn brightly for a short time, but soon you will be snuffed out.
You are but a candle in the wind, mortal. You may burn brightly for a short time, but soon you will be snuffed out.
Let's just see who gets snuffed out first!
